name: Mercury Recycling Limited
goal: Our organisations goals are to provide the best available techniques and protection of human health and the environment for the collection, transportation & treatment/recycling of mercury, waste mercury, waste mercury containing/contaminated items, waste electrical and electronic equipment, batteries and accumulators.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Customs, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
